student_essay:
as you know I moved to Germany 11 years ago. At that time I didn't 
know that I could stay here because the purpose of my move was 
the au-pair programme. Although moving abroad has shaped my 
personal growth so much! 
My first host family was very kind at first, but then they started to 
exploit me. Knowing my rights helped me with this problem. After 
several strange incidents I decided to change my host family. I am 
so glad I did this step and overcame it. I learned so much from 
this situation, especially that I shouldn't let myself be exploited 
and that changes lead to a better life. 
I also learned to be more self-sufficient. It used to get help from 
other people, for example when I was looking for information o 
how to apply for university. My host father helped me a lot in the 
beginnings until he said now I had to do it by myself. It was hard 
especially finding information in another language but diligent 
work paid off. Since then I always look for information by myself. 
Only when can't find the right information do I ask other people. 
Because other people have their own problems and their own 
lives, you shouldn't overload them.
qualitative_feedback:
### Encouraging Comment:
You've shared a personal experience that shows resilience and growth, which is a great strength in your essay.

### Strengths:
Based on the scores, your essay demonstrates good use of vocabulary and phraseology. Your choice of words and phrases helps convey your thoughts and experiences effectively. For example, you used phrases like "personal growth" and "exploited me" that show a range of vocabulary and express your feelings clearly.

### Areas for Improvement:
1. **Cohesion:** Work on improving the flow of your essay by connecting ideas more smoothly. For instance, you can use transitional phrases to link your thoughts and experiences logically. This will make your essay easier to follow for the reader.
   
2. **Conventions:** Pay attention to punctuation and sentence structure to enhance clarity. For instance, in the sentence "Only when can't find the right information do I ask other people," there is a missing subject before "can't." It should be "Only when I can't find the right information do I ask other people."

By focusing on improving cohesion for better flow and conventions for clearer communication, your essay will become more engaging and easier for others to understand. Keep up the good work!
